author: Seattle Times staff
title: Coming up: Festivals and events in Northwest, B.C.
text:
Events beyond Seattle
Washington Orcas Island Chamber Music Festival, Aug. 6-22, Eastsound. 360-376-6636 or oicmf.org .
San Juan County Fair, Aug. 12-15, Friday Harbor. visitsanjuans.com .
Blues and Seafood, Aug. 14-15, Ilwaco. 360-642-2400 or bluesandseafood.com .
